alert.note: Alert for Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 8500 And 11000 Ft; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains above 11000 Ft; Wet Mountains above 10000 Ft; Wet Mountains between 6300 and 10000Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 03 at 6:20PM MDT until April 04 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 8 inches. * WHERE...Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 8500 and 11000 Feet, Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Feet, Wet Mountains between 6300 and 10000 Feet and Wet Mountains Above 10000 Feet Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 8500 And 11000 Ft; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains above 11000 Ft; Wet Mountains above 10000 Ft; Wet Mountains between 6300 and 10000Ft
